data.prayer: Father, let those from the 38,316 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Progreso, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of El Progreso.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in El Progreso, Guatemala.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the state of El Progreso to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of El Progreso that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Spanish-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in El Progreso. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of El Progreso.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in El Progreso, Guatemala. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
